title: Michigan's attorney general charges 16 people in fake elector scheme
description: The so-called fake electors signed documents falsely attesting that Donald Trump won the state in the 2020 election.

title: Judge to decide timing of Trump classified documents trial in hearing to start soon
description: Federal prosecutors want to proceed with a speedy trial to begin in December. But Trump's lawyers are seeking a delay until after the 2024 presidential election

title: This fossil of a mammal biting a dinosaur captures a death battle's final moments
description: A 125-million-year-old fossil from the early Cretaceous shows the skeletons of a smaller mammal biting a larger horned dinosaur, suggesting a much more complex ancient food web.

title: Trump says he received a letter saying he's a target of DOJ's Jan. 6 investigation
description: The former president says he learned Sunday that he may be charged with a federal crime by a grand jury investigating the Capitol siege. A spokesman for special counsel Jack Smith declined to comment.

title: U.S. man is detained in North Korea after crossing the border
description: The man was touring the Demilitarized Zone that divides the Korean Peninsula when he crossed into North Korea without authorization, according to the United Nations Command.

title: Up First briefing: Trump hearing; U.S-China climate talks; Taylor Swift breaks records
description: A pretrial hearing takes place today in Trump's classified documents case. U.S. climate envoy John Kerry is in China to revive climate change efforts. Taylor Swift breaks another Billboard record.

title: 'Hospital-at-home' trend means family members must be caregivers – ready or not
description: It's taking off around the country: Treatment at home for patients sick enough to be in a hospital, but stable enough to be home. Are family caregivers ready for all the responsibility?

title: It's a journey to the center of the rare earths discovered in Sweden
description: Sweden says it found the largest deposit in Europe of rare earths — ingredients in a host of technologies from e-vehicles to wind turbines. Mining and processing them is another story.

title: 'Crook Manifesto' takes Colson Whitehead's heist hero in search of Jackson 5 tickets
description: The playful second book in the author's Harlem Trilogy shows Ray Carney scheming how to get his teenage daughter into the concert of her dreams. Alarming capers ensue.

title: No winner in Monday's Powerball drawing has the next jackpot approaching $1 billion
description: The jackpot for Wednesday's drawing would be the third highest in U.S. history and will grow until someone wins. The game's odds of 1-in-292.2 million are designed to build big prizes.

title: The New York Police Department has sworn in a Latino commissioner for the first time
description: Edward Caban has 32 years of experience in the NYPD and was picked as the department's first deputy commissioner in 2022. He follows in the footsteps of his father, who was a transit detective.
